Udaan Outdoors

Categories #Website

Personally curated outdoor events which relax your body and ignites your soul. Udaan is a community of adventure and outdoor enthusiasts and professionals completely dedicated to meeting the needs of people wanting to travel for adventure and nature. Our purpose is finding peace and experiencing give and take relation with nature.

Orran'da Jewellery

Categories #Website

At Orran’Da we serve you with the exclusive quality and most durable precious metals varying from Solid 22k to 14k Gold. Our knowledge of craftsmanship has been passed down from Lineage of Gold handicraft revolving around the country, which helps us to present you the finest of the finest quality materials as per your unique style. Our self made empire who’s aim is to deliver the delicacy pan India making us choose the online methods to reach you.

Skills

  • Wordpress
  • Elementor
  • PHP
  • CSS

Legal Maximus

Categories #Website

LegalMaximus ADR Platform is established to promote ADR mechanisms through ‘institutional arbitration’ & ‘institutional mediation’. It is the first ever ‘Institutional Arbitration & Mediation Centre’ that aims to address the need to institutionalising arbitrations and mediations. For this purpose, LegalMaximus has framed its own set of “Arbitration Rules” and “Mediation Rules” which govern the administration of arbitrations and mediations.

Skills

  • Bootstrap
  • CSS
  • JavaScript
  • Photoshop
